mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, id.item_id, ii.item_name AS name, ii.item_sort, ii.state, ib.item_brand_name, id.item_pica AS pic, c.num, iv.stock_num AS goodLeaveNum, iv.item_sku_price AS price, iv.item_sKU AS item_SKU, iv.item_property_name,iv.item_property_info, iv.item_property_name_two,iv.item_property_two_value, iv.item_property_name_three,iv.item_property_three_value, iv.item_property_four_name,iv.item_property_four_value, iv.item_property_five_name,iv.item_property_five_value, iv.item_property_six_name,iv.item_property_six_value FROM cart c LEFT JOIN item_value iv ON c.item_SKU=iv.item_sKU LEFT JOIN item_info ii ON iv.item_id=ii.item_id LEFT JOIN item_detail id ON iv.item_id=id.item_id LEFT JOIN item_brand ib ON ii.item_brand_id=ib.item_brand_id WHERE c.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY c.cart_id ORDER BY c.created DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET num=num+#{num} WHERE item_SKU=#{itemSKU} AND user_id=#{userId};
UPDATE cart SET num=#{num} WHERE item_SKU=#{itemSKU} AND user_id=#{userId};
mapper.select: DELETE cart FROM cart LEFT JOIN item_value ON cart.item_SKU=item_value.item_sKU LEFT JOIN item_info ON item_value.item_id=item_info.item_id WHERE item_info.state=0 AND cart.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND item_SKU=#{itemSKU};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM cart WHERE item_SKU=#{itemSKU} and user_id=#{userId};
